DOC.brief_summary: The use of Rituximab has been proposed to be useful and avoid the use of radiotherapy in diffuse large B-cell lymphoma with bulky disease.We assess efficacy of adjuvant radiotherapy in patients treated with R-CHOP
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of primary mediastinal lymphoma No previous treatment performance status < 2 HIV, Hepatis B and C negative Normal :Renal, hepatic, pulmonary and cardiac function pregnancy
